name: SilverLine
description:
CONTROLS:

Use WASD to move 

Use ESCAPE to quit

Hold E to access the inventory and unequip paintings

Use SCROLL WHEEL to browse the inventory

LEFT CLICK to equip paintings and interact

Use R to restart

WHERE AM I?

You are a lone ART DEALER. In the SUBWAY under the city streets your favorite PROPELLER HAT has been stolen by a mysterious traveler. Buy cheap paintings and resell them at a higher price to buy your hat back. Make sure to watch out for fake artwork.

WHAT IS THIS?

SILVERLINE was created in 48 hours, for the 2021 48 HOUR CHALLENGE, at the College for Creative Studies, in Detroit Michigan.

WHO MADE THIS?

BRENDAN ROARTY - Code

DILLAN MURILLO - 2D Artist, Trailer

MARISSA BOROWSKI- 3D Artist

MADELINE PAPPAS - 2D Artist
